title: How Kim Kardashian West has changed the face of global culture
text:
She's a world-famous reality star with a multi-million dollar business empire, a global social media following, and direct access to the president of the United States.

And Kim Kardashian West has done this all by making herself a brand, a move that is almost unprecedented in the world of celebrity.

This week E! True Hollywood Story will explore how Kim achieved this extraordinary feat and became one of the most influential celebrities on the planet

To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

Kim Kardashian West has become a world-famous reality star with a multi-million dollar business empire and a global social media following by turning herself into a brand

Kim grew up in Beverly Hills surrounded by fame, but when it came to her own rise to stardom she took a very different route from the celebrities she rubbed shoulders with in Hollywood.

As Kim's profile grew, many within the industry were convinced that she could never sustain her celebrity.

But this was no 15 minutes of fame. With some 149 million followers on Instagram, Kim has used social media to forge an unrivaled brand, her reach now extending into everything from fashion and fragrances to cosmetics, gaming, and even politics.

Kim (pictured with Paris Hilton in 2007, left, and in 2008, right) forged an unconventional path to fame, using social media to become one of the most influential celebrities on the planet

To date, she has graced the covers of many of the world's major magazines - including Glamour, Forbes and Vogue - and inspired the phrase 'break the internet' after appearing on the cover of Paper Magazine.

She's also half of one of the starriest A-list couples in the world, having married Kanye West in 2014, and a devoted mom to four young children.

So how exactly did Kim do it?

From her father's involvement in the OJ Simpson trial to Keeping up with the Kardashians, E! True Hollywood Story will trace the evolution of Kim's fame, and investigate exactly how the reality star's marketing genius turned her into a global brand.

E! True Hollywood Story: Who is Kim Kardashian West will air on October 13.
description: This week E! True Hollywood Story will explore how Kim used social media to forge her own unique path to fame and the ways in which she marketed herself to create a unrivaled brand.
